parameters.name: tenantID
parameters.label: Tenant ID

parameters.name: groupOfItem
parameters.label: The group of menu items to display. Example: Breakfast

parameters.name: timeTillImageTransition
parameters.label: Image transition delay in seconds

parameters.name: ImagePaginationSpeed
parameters.label: speed taken for photo transition in seconds

parameters.name: showCaption
parameters.label: Show image caption

parameters.name: captionColour
parameters.label: Caption colour. Can be given in colour code or colour name. Example: #FFFFFF or white

parameters.name: newsTransitionSpeed
parameters.label: News transition delay in seconds.

parameters.name: backgroundColour
parameters.label: background colour. Can be given in colour code or colour name. Example: #FFFFFF or white

parameters.name: div1BackgroundColour
parameters.label: items background colour(Left column). Can be given in colour code or colour name. Example: #FFFFFF or white

parameters.name: div2BackgroundColour
parameters.label: pricing background colour(middle column). Can be given in colour code or colour name. Example: #FFFFFF or white

parameters.name: div3BackgroundColour
parameters.label: image background colour(Right column). Can be given in colour code or colour name. Example: #FFFFFF or white

parameters.name: footerBackgroundColour
parameters.label: Footer background colour(bottom). Can be given in colour code or colour name. Example: #FFFFFF or white

parameters.name: textColour
parameters.label: Main Text colour. Can be given in colour code or colour name. Example: #FFFFFF or white

parameters.name: textColourHeading
parameters.label: Heading Text colour. Can be given in colour code or colour name. Example: #FFFFFF or white

parameters.name: textColourNews
parameters.label: Bottom news Text colour. Can be given in colour code or colour name. Example: #FFFFFF or white

parameters.name: textColourCaption
parameters.label: Image caption Text colour. Can be given in colour code or colour name. Example: #FFFFFF or white

parameters.name: fontFamily
parameters.label: fontFamily for the text

parameters.name: showLogo
parameters.label: Show the tenant logo

parameters.name: numberOfItems
parameters.label: Number of items to be displayed at once

parameters.name: fontSize
parameters.label: fontSize of item name and price in px

parameters.name: transitionTime
parameters.label: time for menu items to transition in seconds
